H0.text: On which river does Cardiff stand. Severn

H1.text: On which river does Cardiff stand. Usk

H2.text: On which river does Cardiff stand. Wye

H3.text: On which river does Cardiff stand. Taff

A4.text: The Taff flows into Cardiff Bay, an artificial lake created by the construction of the Cardiff Bay Barrage in the 1990s, before flowing into the Severn Estuary.
